- The most efficient segment for 4 consecutive years (Internal Investigation Report by more than 200 employees and 90 stores for 6 brands).

-  2007-2009:  Software  Development  Specialist  -  Kien Giang Community College - NIIT Institute
- English skills: Speaking, Reading, Writing average.
- Specialization: POS Solutions, Power BI, SQL Server, C#,  DMS,  ITMS,  eOffice,  Webapp,  ERP  (SAP,  Bravo), HRM

-  Leadership, management skill and teamwork.
-  Communication, deal effectively skills.
-  IT policies and procedures.
-  IT system, Optimize the system.

Manage supporters and implementers for D-ERP project (DMS + ERP).
SQL server data management and data management hana database.
I have successfully built and optimized SAP ERP system for many businesses in different fields such as: F&B, FMCG, Retail. I  have  achieved  the  best  user  support  and  quickly  guide  users  to  solve  day-to-day operational problems on SAP.
Using  the  knowledge  that  I  have  accumulated,  I  have  successfully  integrated  and  connected  many systems such as POS, Invoice, DMS systems to ERP and successfully built a centralized database to make analytical reports. demonstrated through Power BI and Tableau.
Skills: Office 365, IT Infrastructure Management, ETL Tool, Hana Database, MySQL, SQL server, Mongodb, SAP B1, Power BI, Tableau, Devops (CICD), DMS, Intergartion

Application management of IT software services provided such as: eOffice, ERP Bravo, DMS, CRM, POS, HRM Lạc Việt, and coordinating the integration of POS systems with other systems such as ERP, Delivery systems, eInvoice, Power BI, Data and divide human resources according to the software service providers for the company  application development to provide solutions for information security in audit of IT system audit. Manage software license certificates used. Developers of tools for optimal service. Planning  system  audit  on  45  periodic  stores.  Develop  business  process  for analysis reports as required.
Skills: Office 365, IT Infrastructure Management, DMS, Power BI, Data management, POS, Intergartion

Technical  team  management  6  people.  Training  team  development.  Plan  and  divide  human  resources according to the project. Support sales and customer care departments in technical matters. Solve serious problems from the customer system. Consulting and implementing POS, Warehouse, CRM reports according to customer requirements. Consulting and coordinating the integration of POS systems with other systems such as ERP, Delivery systems, eInvoice, Power PI, Data warehouse, ...

metadata.section: IV. 01/2015 - 06/2018: QSR VIET NAM (Invested by VIG investment funds).

chunks.content: Manage two employees at the  HCM office. Deploying and  operating the IT  system managing 5 brands (Pizza  Company,  Swensen's,  Dairy  Queen,  Buffalo  Wild  Wings,  AKA  ...)  and  more  than  90  shops  in Vietnam nationwide.

Building and developing application software according to the development trend of enterprises. Optimized multi-branch  management  application  software.  Participate  in  the  implementation  of  software  projects such as SAP, POS, Call Center, BI Report, CRM, HR Portal, Service Desk, ....
HOBBIES
:
-  Traveling, exchanging friends.
-  Research new technology.
